GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: memleak flow rule from commit path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit ab9f34a30c23f656e76f4c5b83125a4e7b53c86e, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit c9626a2cbdb20e26587b3fad99960520a023432b. For more details please see the references link.
